tool.name: AnalyzeGlobalLoS

param.name: in_los
param.dialogReference: Input Global Lines of Sight in form of Feature Layer.

param.name: in_observer_offset
param.dialogReference: Vertical offset of observers from the surface. Specified as field, as each observer point can have different offset.

param.name: in_target_offset
param.dialogReference: Vertical offset of the target from the surface. Specified as field, as each target point can have different offset.

param.name: in_target_x
param.dialogReference: X coordinate of the target point. Used to identify it on Line of Sight. Specifed as Field in the atribute table.

param.name: in_target_y
param.dialogReference: Y coordinate of the target point. Used to identify it on Line of Sight. Specifed as Field in the atribute table.

param.name: in_use_curvature
param.dialogReference: Allows correction for the earth's curvature. Unchecked—No curvature correction will be applied(default). Checked—Curvature correction will be applied.

param.name: in_ref_coeff
param.dialogReference: Coefficient of the refraction of visible light in air (default value 0.13).

tool.summary: This tools calculates several characteristics from theGlobalLines of Sight and adds the result as new fields to the attribute table.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tools calculates several characteristics from theGlobalLines of Sight and adds the result as new fields to the attribute table.
